content.detailedDescription: Rawr.
content.summary: Thurr werr aliens i say

content.detailedDescription:
We saw three golden orbs hovering above us from the north coming slowly over us and then passing to the south in a triangular shaped one very high and two below. two passengers in our car saw them coming toward us slowly. as they passed over our car, the passenger in back seat also watched. we saw them first through front windshield then sunroof then back window. golden orange big orbs. we were traveling from san jose going north through concord california when we first saw the orbs at 10:30 at first week that they were airplanes flying into san jose airport.
we thought we were looking at airplanes but then we saw that they were big round orbs and it we were shocked and surprised and excited to think they were ufos and we follow them with our eyes and watch them.
content.summary: We were driving south on hwy. 680 heading north, as we drove through concord, ca at 10:30 pm. three orbs flew overhead, going south. we watched then come toward us, and a passenger in the back seat watched as they flew away from us and disappear...

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving down a country road in springfield, oh. heading towards my brother's house. she noticed something in the field, at first she thought it was a helicopter but as we got closer it looked like a triangle hovering over a field. i stopped to take a picture and it raised up and started floating westward above the trees. i got 1 photo before it took off. i turned around and started following the craft at about 75 to 85 mph and i couldn't keep up with it. it made a pulsating hum sound. but real quiet. my girlfriend was scared of it, i was excited. the object flew into the horizon.
content.summary: Saw triangle hovering over a field. when i stopped it raised up above tree level and headed west.

content.detailedDescription:
Five members of family were looking at mars.  a very bright light just seemed to appear.  it had a smaller, more faint light in front.  as though the two were on identical trajectory, or the one is front was actually towing the larger brighter object behind.  don't think it was self-luminous.  objects went from northwest to southeast, before disappearing on horizon.
they appeared to be very high altitude.  if one single object, appeared extremely long.
content.summary: Very bright while watching mars.  not sure if self-luminous or reflecting sunlight.

content.detailedDescription:
Star like

 looking out of the window. i often look out to see what's going on. when i first saw it i thought it was alpha centauri it was so bright. it looked like a very bright star, then it suddenly moved to the south and then vanished. i hope it didn't see me and closed curtains. object vanished under a clear sky.
content.summary: Star like- sudenly moved to the south and vanished

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Out side with my wife for a cig. bright white orb moving from north to se. saw a commercial plane lower than ufo moving ne. turned to look back at the bright white orb and my wife noticed there was now a soft white light in front pacing it.Seemed to possible be part of it because it was pacing the orb. tue object disappeared into a low altitude cloud
content.summary: Turned to look back at the bright white orb and my wife noticed there was now a soft whit light in front pacing it. object disappeared into a low altitude cloud

content.detailedDescription: My grandson and i were sitting in the hot tub when this object came out from behind our backyard trees almost directly overhead at a very high altitude. it was obviously not a plane cause it was round and bright white with a fuzzy edge and actually seemed to be glowing. there were no blinking lights like a plane would have and it was at least 5 times bigger and brighter than a star. it was traveling almost due south but slightly easterly and made no noise. i continued to watch it until it disappeared over the horizon. a plane came over a few minutes later traveling at high altitude in a slightly south west direction. the sound of the plane was trailing behind it by approximately 90 degrees so it was traveling pretty fast but only about half as fast as the ufo.
content.summary: Bright fuzzy light at very high altitude at least 5 times brighter than the stars, absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from a day-long trip by car with a friend of mine and it was just 20-30 minutes after the sun had set and as i was sitting on the co driver's seat i noticed a red light not far from (judging by the relative distance as i was seeing the lights of a house behind it). after telling my friend to slow down the car so we could see better, he pointed out that he can't cause other people had already parked on that part of the highway (and there is nothing there like a food stop or toilet). after about 100 meters we stopped and we were the closest witness to the lights about 50-100 meters from us. we were still in the car just before a bridge which was 50-70 meters high and this red light was actually 3, which we noticed after getting closer. we could clearly see them hovering at a very close distance from us and we knew it wasn't anything man-made because the closest power line was on the bridge that we were on and below the "3 lights" was nothing but trees.After about 4-5 minutes one of these 3 lights stared flickering with a standard pace until 1 second before it vanished the second one started flickering too and one second before that one vanishing too, the last one started flickering until it disappeared completely, never to be seen again that night. the time between the starting of the flickering until it vanished completely was about a minute. after returning home and telling my brother he told me that two (2) days ago the exact same sighting took place about 20 kilometers from the place i witnessed it and he showed me a video footage of the previous sighting. after watching it i realized it was exactly what i saw ! note: the day me and my friend saw it, it was the christian easter. sunday 5/5/2013. the previous and recorded sighting was at 3/5/2013
content.summary: Hovering transparent-like triangle with red-orange flashing lights on each corner.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed the object as i entered my home at night. the weather was very clear with full nighttime darkness. i tend to be a "sky watcher"; as i exited from my car the luminous object was very clear. i considered if it was a plane, helicopter or star. it remained totally stationery and displayed three different color lights with varying light combinations; i used my binoculars to confirm the lights. i then concluded i could not identify the object. 
the object was too far away to determine the exact shape or any other details that would be evident if it was closer to my location. 
several months ago i had observed a similar object (almost identical) at a different location in the sky. both objects eventually disappear from sight.
although i've been a believer in ufos for many years this is the first year i've experienced sightings. the one thing i can state assuredly is that the sightings give me reasons to contemplate any implications of intelligent alien life.
i attempted photos of the object but due to the distance and poor photographic equipment the pictures are very poor.
content.summary: Stationary starlike object emitting 3 colors; white,red,blue in different variations

content.detailedDescription: On april 19, around 10 pm, i was standing on my dock in brighton, mi, on round lake telling my friend about a recent ufo sighting i had. when i pointed to where i saw it, we saw a shooting star fly by. it was going past the big dipper, heading east. it's speed was that of a shooting star as well as it's size. it continued on this path for at least 7 seconds until it stopped far in the horizon. we both expected it to burn out but when it didn't, we both went into shock and never let our eyes off. the color was white, like a star. it was about 90 degrees above us at first sighting, flew for about 7 seconds (maybe more) and came to a stop about 45 degrees in the horizon east of us. it stayed there for at least two hours. it would sporadically flash red or white light. but there was some cloud cover at that angle so this might not be accurate. we both kept an eye on it for about a half hour and then went on to other things but checking up on it about every 10 minutes. sometimes it looked like it may have been moving, ascending very slowly. about two hours after the object had come to a stop, we looked for it again, but it was gone.
content.summary: Friend and i where looking up at sky and saw a shooting star that kept going way longer than it should, then stopped far in the distance for two hours before leaving.

content.detailedDescription: Camin�����bamos con mi madre al mercado llevando un cerdo para la venta es un pueblito lejano se llama san diego de muellamues corregimiento del municipio de guachucal departamento de nari�����o,paso hace mucho tiempo pero lo recuerdo muy claro porque es sencillo,solo observamos en la cordillera una luz que descend�����a pero nos sorprendi����� que se acerco hacia nosotros en un instante luego se poso sobre nosotros y luego se esfumo cambiaba de colores de rojo pasando a naranja azul y blanco lo que no puedo olvidar es el tama�����o y que nunca hab�����a visto algo igual y algo que con el pasar de los a�����os me di cuenta fue un detalle que nunca le pusimos cuidado porque pensamos que nosotros nos equivocamos y es el siguiente. llevamos un cerdo al mercado y del corregimiento al municipio tardariamos unas dos horas en llegar porque ibamos a pie y despacio salimos a las 3 am  nos faltaban unos 30 minutos para llegar supuestamente llegariamos a las 5 am pero llegamos a las 3 .30 am pensamos que nos equivocamos al mirar la hora de salida pero recuerdo que ten�����amos costumbre de verificar para llegar a tiempo. no recuerdo que haya pasado algo mas
content.summary: Disco de gran tamaã‘o y volumen

content.detailedDescription:
Era a media tarde posiblemente las 3, regresabamos de una salida de comer a medio camino a chapala, despues de estar en nuestra ��rea de trabajo, una compa��era y yo.
la tarde estaba algo nublada de hecho una horas antes hab��a llovido y en algunas ��reas lloviznaba, justo al salir de la curva en direcci��n de chapala a guadalajara, donde esta el rancho de los tres potrillos, exactamente enfrente de la gasolinera en el lado derecho de la carretera esta un ��rbol alto grande frondoso. ah�� estaba un ovni flotando a ras del suelo bajo el ��rbol, al salir de la curva al verlo como pude me orille ya que es una carretera muy transitada, le se��ale a mi compa��era  mira���� lo vez����, y solo se quedo as�� como hinoptizada tratando de ver con unos ojos bien abiertos lo esplendido y maravilloso que se ve��a esa "cosa", era un ovni clasico es decir as�� con forma de disco y su c��pula como de cristal muy transparente a la distancia que estabamos era aprox 100 mts. y veiamos al objeto como de un diametro de 4 mts. aprox. estaba as�� bamboleandose bajo el ��rbol a escasa distancia del suelo, semejante a los platillos chinos cuando estan  a punto de caerse. no reflejaba la luz, era de un tono dorado cobrizo, la superficie de arriba era una franja lisa y otra mas abajo con una serie de lineas concentricas , otra parte lisa y la siguiente con lineas concentricas tambien, se me asemejaban como si fuera una superficie antiderrapante tal vez.
la parte de abajo era hueca es decir as�� como una campana muy abierta y de superficie  con lineas de dentro hacia afuera un poco espaciadas una de otra, un poco mas opaca o sucia semejante a ollin, trataba de ver como era que se sosten��a flotando pero nada se notaba. algo que not�� fue que en la gasolinera habia o estaban los despachadores jugando a la rayuela, es decir pintan una raya en el suelo y tiraban monedas haber quien ganaba al quedar mas cerca de la raya, pero no miraban ni notaban nada,  y estaban justo enfrente de ellos, por otro lado los autos y camiones que pasaban a su casi escasos metros de costado tampoco lo veian, es increible����.
me acerque unos metros mas sin perderlo de vista y ah�� segu��a toda una belleza, algo verdaderamente explendoroso, intente acercarme mas, me cubri�� la vista una peque��a lomita y al salir ya no lo vimos mas, fueron escasos unos dos minutos viendolo y es toda una experiencia.
content.summary: Observamos un ovni clasico con su cupula flotando a ras de suelo bajo un árbol frondoso a un costado de una carretera muy transitada

content.detailedDescription:
On monday april 21, 2014 at approx 3:15pm i was finishing up my jog at the local park here in donora, pa. called palmer park. i noticed slightly to the left of my position above the treetops on the hill was a huge black rectangle object moving slowly over the treetops. moving right to left. it had a very "boxy" look to it, sharp defined edges. this thing was very far away, about 1-2 miles. the park i was at is way up on a hill so that's how i was able to see it so far away. this object did not reflect the daytime sun. i saw no lights on it or windows. it was far away so all i can say is what i saw from the distance of where i was. the object did appear to change shape, going from a large solid rectangle to a thinner but just as long rectangle. it was just cruising along very very slowly above the treetops and even hovered a few times. it was 2-3 times the size of the goodyear blimp i'd say for as big as it appeared for as far away as i knew it was. it was really close, touching the treetops practically. i did not have my phone to take a photo. i was still a ways form my car where my phone was so i tried to jog to my car as fast as i could being already out of breath. there were some other people there at the park. i knew i needed to get other people to confirm this sighting. there were two women sitting watching their kids play on the playground. i was still some walking distance from them so i kept my eye on this object while i made my way over to them. at this point the object has crossed over a gap between the large hillsides to continue its course over the next hillside and treetops. this object i swear changed shape a few times. getting thinner then real big again. always maintaining the rectangle shape and dull black color. also it appeared to move sideways, backing up away from my position, then back towards me again.

i finally reached the two women and asked them "ok ladies, what do you think that is? a ufo?" they both replied excitedly "i don't know, we were just talking about that!" i told them if they had a camera phone to please take a picture of it. the one woman did hold up her phone, i don't know if she was able to photograph it. they both were clueless as to what it was, as was i. mind you, these are strangers so i wasn't about to intrude on their afternoon family outing, as exciting as this was. i mentioned as i walked away for them to please make a mufon report.

i finished my walk back to my car to see this object descend a little further into the treetops and away out of my sight. i started my car as fast as i could and made my way down the steep hill to the main road (mckean ave) aka the 837. when i reached the street and out of the park the object was no where to be found. i wasn't expecting to see it as it was already 1-2 miles from me way ontop of the hill near the town of monongahela.

i have no idea what this was. i've never seen anything before it in my life. i can say that i didn't expect to see such a "boxy" shape. it definitely appeared to have sharp corner edges to it. not aerodynamic at all. the object for sure changed shape. not into another shape, just got thinner, then big again. the object did not appear to be blowing with the wind. i do not believe this object to have been a balloon, conventional aircraft, blimp, or kite. it was not wobbling. it was solid, steady and appeared to be under intelligent control. i have yet to look into any new missing persons reports in this area. i have not seen any other reports on this sighting yet either. i hope those ladies make their reports and really hoping one got a photo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 witnesses to a daylight sighting of a huge black rectangle ufo at treetop level pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription:
On april 4th i was driving at 35 mph on byberry rd in hatboro pa. an odd shape caught my eye. i saw what appeared to be a bird gliding toward me from ahead. it did not flap, was totally still but moving rapidly toward my car along the side of the road, 15 feet up? about. it was about two to three feet across. i was trying to drive, but looked as often as i could as it approached my car. it was so odd! the movement was unnatural for any bird. as it got nearer i saw it was skeletal. i had the impression of a bunch of strings in a chevron, bird form soaring toward me. but the threads were stiff, rigid, no give. just held that form. maybe thin wires? it moved straight ahead along the road, and i passed it in my car, then that was it.
it was absolutely not a bird. i did not have a clue what it was, but went home and posted on facebook to friends and made a sketch, and asked if anyone knew. friends said a drone. it did not look like any drones i goggled. no central body for an engine. just gliding, directed wires. going pretty fast too.
how did i feel? weirded out. this was something i could not imagine ever being there, acting in this manner.
content.summary: Saw a flying object appearing to be made of wires in a chvron shape gliding in a fixed path along a road.

content.detailedDescription: Three bright orange lights im laying flat. the smell is wet. sort of sea weed. earthy smell. also 3 red dots on side of stomac
content.summary: Wasnt sure where or who to tell this too.

content.detailedDescription: In the blink of an eye it shrank, turned white and vanished.  i am a retired usaf master sergeant (intelligence, top secret crypto clearance) and have never seen anything like it before.  there was no noise nor navigation lights. it flew in a straight line. i assume the people racing through my area were trying to get a look at it.  my wife saw it also. there were no media reports about it and i checked with the local st. louis county police precinct the next day and they said they had no reports of any lights in the sky.
content.summary: Heard alot oc racing throught my quiet subdivision and looked out my easterly facing bedroom window and saw a large red pulsating orb traveling north about a mile away (est.).  it was moving very slowly and i watched it for about 2 minutes.  suddenly,

content.detailedDescription: While traveling to the beach with my parents, i was riding in the back seat of our 1971 grand prix. i was about 14-15 years old. we were going to ocean city, md, if my memory serves me correctly. i happened to look out the small, angled windows from the back seat and noticed a metallic sphere sitting stationary in the blue sky with clouds around it, but not obscuring the object. i was completely puzzled as to what it was, and my first thought was a balloon of some sort, since it was round, but was mesmorized over the object and i could not take my eyes off of it. the more i looked at it, i noticed it could not be a balloon because it was perfectly round and an obvious metallic material; it was highly reflective like polished aluminum, not chrome. this went on for roughly 15-20 minutes and suddenly the object vanished right before my eyes. it didn't fly away, it went from sitting there to vanished, in an instant. my first reaction was to stare at where it was last located in complete disbelief. i struggled to comprehend how something could just vanish without a trace of any kind. well, once this happened i immediately jumped to the conclusion that i had seen a ufo. being a small kid in the 1960's, i was always fascinated with science and especially the space program. i had never seen an object or craft like this and haven't seen anything like it since. i have attached a re-creation i illustrated in photoshop to try and give you a better idea of what i witnessed. i am a graphic designer by trade, so i employed my experience with this software; it is not a photograph. i really wish this was more recent and i did have an actual photograph. i hope this is not a waste of your time since it has been so long ago.
content.summary: Metallic sphere sitting stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription: No sound of any kind. very large. not an aircraft. no way a balloon. very bright orange circle ball like with spike like shards. we earn a lot of money and live in a great neighbor hood. never wanted to say anything until your tv series. thanks. aj
content.summary: My partner and i were swimming in our pool at night visiting when all of a sudden a giant glowing orange ball appeared 100 feet above the ground. it continued at a decline of approximately 45 degree angle. had spike like shards. no sound. no way balloon .

content.detailedDescription: I'm with my two college student decided to make a short relaxing after attending a social gathering.  while at the said park (osme��a park, davao city)we started counting a shooting star above after several minutes we surprise when several lights like a star more or less 10, colored yellow orange appeared above flying one path direction with very fast changing position each other from north to south area.
content.summary: Unexplained lights flying from above having an extra-ordinary movement with faster changing of direction

content.detailedDescription:
There is a very similar story in your files which occurred in ohio on april 10th, 2014.  it matches our experience exactly.  

while in our new hot tub in the back yard of our house, my husband and i both witnessed what appeared to be a triangular or diamond shaped object in the sky.  well, that is the shape i saw, but i am only basing that on how the sky/stars were distorted around it because it seemed to be cloaked.  it was moving very fast and my husband thought it was a falling star or meteor that had broken apart, hence more than one light.  i, however, believed it to be a ufo because the lights did not burn out nor did they separate from each other.  i even mentioned to him that i thought it was a ufo with an invisibility cloak.  i could detect the faintest outline of it.  the lights were a dim white color, and there were 4 total - one at the front, one on each tip of "wing," and another in the back.  

it caught our attention and we looked to the east from where it appeared  and watched it fly overhead towards the west.  we observed it for around 5 seconds.  my husband thought it was neat" but then again, he didn't think it was a ufo.  i however felt a little scared because in my heart, i knew it was not a falling star.  

our house and trees prevented us from observing it further than we did.  

and, just this past tuesday, april 22, my husband witnessed the same exact object again while in the hottub.  he said it looked exactly the same as last time, with the same path, and he now believes as i do that it is a ufo.
content.summary: Cloaked ufo seen in night sky of east texas

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday april 23, 2014 at or around 10:06 pm i went outside to have a smoke. naturally in my neck of the woods the stars shine bright so its second nature to take a look at the heavens. well due south from my front porch and roughly half way up the visible sky i noticed a really bright star. it drew my attention in. i was astonished at its color of a reddish/orange. it was the brightest "star" in the sky. i called my wife outside and pointed it out and she immediately said it was a satellite or a planet. as we focused on it we noticed lights coming out of it in the shape of a jellyfishes tenticles. at this point i felt like i was seeing things and panicked a little. i rubbed my eyes and focused in on it and the "tenticles" we growing out from the orb on all sides. sometimes just one and the most i counted was 9. the extended and retracted. as my attention was fixed on this orb i ran inside and got a blanket and a pillow to lay down and observe to see if the object was mobile. it stayed stationary most of the time and drifted to the south west like the rest of the stars but it had fits of quick movements side to side and up and down. after the fit it would return to its stationary like position. the more i observed i started to notice faint dim objects that seemed to fall from the bottom of it, as well as faint objects returning in the direction of the orb. the returning orbs seemed as if the "tentacles" the main "star" displayed attracted them. as if it was it's way or direction back in. there would be a small bright flash on some of the returning orbs once they came in contact with the "tenticales" . i observed these objects for over. 4 hours and notice it dimmed like it wa gonna disappear and it would brighten back up and the "tentacles" would come back alive. i called many of my friends from all over and they could see it as well. there were also so "flyby" objects that from time to time would appear and show signs of travel toward it or away from it but those never came in contact with the "tentacles". i have some pictures but the clarity is not that good on a iphone but onced zoomed in you can see the startin of the tentacles as well as one picture showed a pretty good single one.
content.summary: The event had a purpose, maybe a portal possibly

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7:45 pm central time i was with a friend on the mississippi state university campus talking beside her car in the commuter east parking lot. i was facing north when i noticed a star-like light appear over the campus and i pointed it out to her. we both were looking at the "star" when it began moving horizontally east and also appeared to be brightening as it moved. she suggested it was an airplane, but we both realized that there were two actual airplanes in the sky, one below the "star" and another to the far west, both airplanes were leaving a trail of airstream behind them, unlike the "star." the star-like light grew incredibly bright and seemed to pulsate for a moment and then disappeared very suddenly. within a minute or two it reappeared significantly higher in the sky from where it disappeared and began moving vertically down in the sky (falling almost "leaf-like") and it was growing dim and then brightening again. at a certain point the second "star" light stopped moving and hovered in the sky. it grew very bright and then a kind of light ejected from the eastern side of the "star" almost like an aura or a flash of light--maybe like a small explosion? i'm not sure what it was, but it was disorienting. the parking lot light above us immediately went out and i commented that that was a very strange coincidence. the light then faded completely and we began talking again. within three to five minutes after the disappearance of the second light, a third "star" appeared in the sky, much to the east of the last one, and was moving horizontally in the sky in the direction of the spot of the last light's disappearance. this one was significantly less-bright than the other two and it moved faster. it disappeared relatively quickly. we waited approximately ten minutes to see if there would be any more lights but we did not see any more "activity." on my drive back home to weir, ms (roughly a 40 minute commute) i kept experiencing the sensation of bright lights coming through my car windows, but they weren't headlights or moon light, and it was actually very terrifying. i left campus with a half tank of gas and when i arrived home the gas tank was completely empty. i have no idea why the ride home was so strange or how i lost so much gas. the whole night is an enigma to me.
content.summary: An appearance of a star-like light that moved both horizontally and vertically above the campus of mississippi state university and dematerialized and reappeared three times within a 15 minute period of time.

content.detailedDescription: At around three am i had gone outside for a smoke (tobacco)and looked up toward mars as it is so bright at this time and noticed what appeared to be a red light a very short distance from the surface at roughly a 2 o'clock position.  i am not into astronomy but only as a curiosity so i had check an almanac to be confident that this was mars and not another planet.  this was quite difficult to see given the light reflecting from mars but by focusing it was quite visible.  the location appeared mostly constant but over time it would appear to move closer to the surface and then after a time move away again.  as i was observing this i noticed another light that was located in the seven o'clock position much closer to the surface.  this light appeared to change position from at the surface to move towards and at times cover the surface or go behind mars.  at just after four am my wife got up and i immediately asked her to look at the this.  i did not tell her what i saw but asked her to look at mars.  i wanted verification to what i was witnessing as i was wondering if i was seeing things that aren't there.  after a few seconds she saw what i was seeing only the lights appeared white to her.  i have no idea what these lights could be.  the only feelings i had were what in the hell was i seeing.  this was visible to close to the time that mars set around five am.  we live at the edge of edwards afb and ten miles from any town so it is quite easy to see objects in the night sky.
content.summary: I witnessed lights near the mars as it was in transit.  one appeared near the surface and one some distance away.

content.detailedDescription:
Across the street from me is a pasture with 20 or so cows. 
i was on my porch looking across the field when i saw something move by a tree just above the lower pasture, i kept my eyes there and "it" stepped out...Strangest thing i ever saw. it looked really tall, 7ft to 10ft it looked really skinny stick like.
i could see very long fingers on the hands.  it was approx 20ft from a cow that it appeared to be watching.  i wanted a better look and started to move toward the door to get my binoculars, watching it all the while..As soon as i moved it sprinted toward the woods at the base of a small mountain/hill.
the stride it made was amazing to see, the sprint was more like speed walking...Very smooth quick long strides almost gliding with leg & knee movement.  it was greyish brown and blended perfectly with trees.
as i saw it enter the treeline...It paused and looked back over the pasture toward me, i then went to go get my binoculars since i could not see that far very well.  when i got back with them i scanned the treeline where i last saw it and saw it just peeking around a tree and part of it's leg past the tree...Then it just disappeared.  

funny...I just read the instructions to the right...I think i covered everything but how i felt.
i was amazed at what i was seeing, i felt a little anxiety when i knew it had seen me, that passed as i rationalized it was the one with anxiety at being seen.

i guess i should add another experience.
this happened a few months later and very hard for me to describe and i have questioned it ever since.  the image in my head of where i was has not left, nor a short portion of communication when i was there.

it was a dream i thought... i was quite suddenly from being fully asleep no dreams not aware of anything, in a dark room with two pale beings who spoke telepathically to me, they brought me to another room and we looked down upon another being that was on a suspended on circular floor that was shiny and black. the being was either squatting or very short in front of that being was another giant shiny black stone or what reminded me of the monolith from 2001 space odeyssy.(sp)  i remember thinking why am i here? and one of the beings answered ...She doesn't hear/speak to us anymore. she turned to me and said i can with you. note this was said telepathically.  then they put me on the floor with her she showed me the black stone/screen i could see colored lights on it and was finely marked with a grid pattern on it.  she told/asked me about a decision she was about to make that would affect the earth for a very long time.  i cannot remember the decision now, but i remember it was either moral or ethical and had longterm affects for us.  i know i answered in more moral way, but cannot remember exactly.  she then touched/pointed an area of the stone/screen and lights moved on it.  i was suddenly awake and found myself laying in bed and feeling very concerned.
content.summary: Saw a strange being across the street from my house

content.detailedDescription: I reported an incident a couple of months ago.  i was asked to send the sd card to mufon which is located just south of jackson, ms.  i did. they could not recover the photo i had erased.  i got an e-mail from a man in montreal canada (initials j. c.) and he said to send it to him, he'd try to recover it.  well, i got it back a few days ago, he could not recover the photo but my sd card was ruined.  it states "this card cannot be used".  i think this man is against ufo sightings.  i should have known better but if this photo comes up anywhere - will take him to court over it.  i've already talked to a lawyer, he now has the disk and i am very upset. this was two pictures of an alien, the first one i erased, the second one you could still see him but he was fading out.  i just want to get this on record as to what happened to this disk and my pictures.
content.summary: Already in the system

content.detailedDescription:
The date was 4-21-2014. i had just spent a couple hours photographing some waterfowl and on my way home i stopped at the local target store to pick up a prescription. at approximately 8:20 p.M. as i was walking from the vehicle to the store i happen to notice a really bright light low in the eastern sky. my initial thought was why would a commercial airliner be coming in straight from the east and why is it so low. when commercial flights approach from the east the flight pattern is to the south of here and considerably higher. as i watched the light i realized it wasn't an airliner. the entire light was pulsating with no flashing lights and it wasn't getting any closer or further away from me. within approximately 30 seconds of watching the light a second light appeared to the right, south, of the first light. it too was pulsating and didn't appear to be moving. within approximately another 30 seconds a third pulsating light appeared to the left, north, of the first light.


keeping an eye on the lights i went back to my vehicle and got my camera. i have a nikon d5000 dslr with a 70 to 300mm zoom lens. all three lights blinked out one-by-one before i could get the camera ready. i continued to wait and watch and sure enough one of the light's blinked back on again. this light did appear to be moving up and to the right. i was able to take a few photos of the light before it blink out.  i watched for awhile longer and saw no more lights so i put the camera away and went into the store.


when i came back out of the store there were no more lights in the sky but i got the camera and waited for awhile and sure enough at approximately 8:47 p.M. the light blinked back on again. i tried some different settings on the camera and some of the shutter speeds were to slow and the images blurred. a second light blinked on again to the right, south, of the first light. then the first light blinked out. the second light started moving to the right, south, and i was able to capture a few seconds of video of it as it went behind the store. i had placed the camera on the roof of my vehicle in an attempt to get as clear and steady a video as possible.


when i got home i viewed the photos on my computer and noticed on the photos that were blurred the blurring caused several more lights to appear in the photo that were not visible to my naked eye.


throughout my life i have had several encounters with ufos and unexplained lights but this was the first time i was able to captured photos and video.
content.summary: Bright pulsating lights that would appear and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went outside to look for any residual meteors from the recent shower. we saw a star that seemed to be moving in all directions. i fixed the top of a palm tree in my periferal vision and this proved that it was indeed moving. the object was at an exremely high altitude and was changing in colour slowly, whilst moving in arcs and straight lines. its movement was slow, similar to the speed of a satelite but it changed direction often and after watching it for an hour it is still above as i write this. its movement seemed to be within a range of 10 degrees in all directions if that makes sense, if we are talking 360 degrees. i rang my brother who lives about 30 km from me and he can see it too.
content.summary: Moving star above brisbane australia.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my apartment on my bed, surfing the internet. suddenly through my window i see a blinding (almost neon) white-blue light appear, so bright it seemed like it was daylight outside. had no idea what it could be. it was only there for a very short amount of time. maybe 2 seconds before it disappeared, i hear a boom, but it wasn't a very significant one. as soon as this happens, all electricity goes out in my apartment, my watch and clocks reset themselves to random times (mind you i was wearing an analog watch), etc. about 10 seconds later it comes back on, with no trace of the object outside. there is no source of electricity within 500 yards of my balcony, and no transformer was blown. pretty puzzling.
content.summary: Blinding blue light all of a sudden followed by an almost quiet boom, then all power and electricity goes out.

content.detailedDescription:
I brought my dogs out to pee in our backyard approximately 8:50 pm 4/23/14,
i was looking up and noticed a bright light moving across the sky that didn't look like a plane or any craft i would know of,just a bright whiteish light moving unusually fast that grabbed my attention,i thought it may be a shooting star but it slowed for about 20 to 30 secs then changed direction and brightened, then there was a small blueish white flash and it accelerated and was gone towards northeast sky in san diego county. i was amazed at what i saw and excited, i murmured to my self, wholly sh**, i just saw a ufo.

i was writing in to you to document this and hoping to see if any other people had a similar experience in san diego on this night.
content.summary: Bright light moving across the sky that didn't look like a plane or any craft i would know of

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon,

men's lacrosse game, chestertown, md, 04/19/14: 

i am a professional photographer who has worked with the nfl, the lacrosse industry, and a couple of the major wire services for years. i have followed and appreciated your work as well for years. i know my gear, and know what i see. in this case, i never did see with my naked eye an object in the sky  but my camera did. this object occurred and was solid. 

i have unaltered pictures of said object that defy explanation. the object appears mathematically elliptical because it's sideways and has a heat/energy/gravitational field/aura/whatever around it in pictures ten minutes apart. these images prove it is not a lens, bug, light, dust, etc... it is opaque, has highlights, and moves all over the place.

what i know with these images that i am attaching to you is that something that was not a frisbee, bug on my lens or camera sensor, a mouthguard, a bird, a plane, malaysian flight 370 or superman was flying around at exceptionally hight speed(s) and is nothing like i have ever seen or not seen or not seen before.

what my camera saw that i never saw, highly observant as i am, was something solid that was quite far away and moving extremely fast. my guess is over 40.000 mph given that i was shooting at 1/800th of a second coupled with the level to which the object was out of focus.

i was using a 24mm lens at f7.1. anything within miles would have been sharp/in focus given the physical characteristics of the lens. for something that size to have been visible in my frame and out of focus, it had to have been huge. 

i am baffled. little if anything escapes my attention when i shoot, yet i never saw this. i am a nationally recognized photographer and have credentials. seeing stuff is my job. i never saw this, yet it flew into my frame(s) at least three times.

i thank you in advance for your thoughts and expertise - my folder of images is attached. notice how far and fast the object moves between frame #4 and #6. it's wild stuff. i'm perplexed and hope you have some ideas as to what was out there. something was.

thanks, larry french

cell: 443 994-1554
content.summary: My camera photographed a ufo that i never saw. this was a solid object.
